title: An ordinance of Parliament for a day of publike thanksgiving for the peace concluded between England and Scotland.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,
notes: Dated at end: Die Veneris 27. die Augusti 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With coat of arms of Charles I at head of document.
